newsitem.title: USA: Datakey to integrate product for Netscape.
newsitem.headline: Datakey to integrate product for Netscape.

text.p: Datakey Inc said Monday it will integrate its cryptographic token hardware with Netscape Communications Corp's software to heighten security for Netscape's customers.
Terms of the deal were not disclosed.

Under an original equipment manufacturer relationship between the two companies, Datakey will integrate its smart card and smart key cryptographic token hardware with Netscape's Communicator 4.0 client software.
Netscape Communicator client software is the open mail, groupware and browser series of products for corporate intranets and the Internet.

"The Netscape and Datakey relationship directly addresses the more demanding security needs of our enterprise customers," Bob Lisbonne, vice president of client product marketing at Netscape, said in a statement.
